entry.title: WIND WARNING , North Mountain (Cape Breton)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:39 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Mountain 11:00 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Temperature: -7.6°C
Humidity: 95 %
Dewpoint: -8.3°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 3 except near minus 8 over the Highlands.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 3 except near minus 8 over the Highlands. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 5 except minus 10 inland.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 5 except minus 10 inland. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow or rain. High 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning then changing to rain in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Rainfall amount 10 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 90 except gusting to 130 from Margaree Harbour to Bay St. Lawrence in the afternoon. High 10. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023
